TA0029.title: Anti-Collection Gangs
TA0029.description: Anti-collection gangs are organizations or individuals specializing in helping debtors evade debts through various illegitimate means, harming creditors' legitimate rights. These gangs typically operate under the guise of debt consulting, rights representation, and repayment negotiation, inducing or forcing debtors to take illegal measures to evade debts while extracting high profits.
